rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Puissance[/i] – Whenever Effie, Army of One attacks a player alone, she gets +1/+1 for each creature defending player controls.
[i]Wary Fighter[/i] – Effie can't be blocked by more than one creature each combat.
